The penis cookie isn't bad either.  Just make sure you like coconut  'cause it's a whole lot of coconut.

If you're in the area, Hot Cookie is a nice little treat to satisfy your sweet tooth.
author: Laina T.

description:
I have gotten a few baked goods here and they really don't do it for me. The cookie I had was dry and boring (I like soft cookies), the rice crispy treat was too sweet. I mean their thing is the penis cookie, so if that is what you want, go for it, but I would not say this a place focuses on quality baked goods. They have different priorities, like underwear. I suppose that if you want to look good in underwear, you shouldn't eat cookies anyway. Maybe that is their goal with the not tasty cookies.

I will stick to baking my own cookies for now.
author: Caitlin H.

description:
The penis cookie is obviously money.  But it was SO dense and dry, it took me like 5 days to eat.  

Maybe mini moist penises would be better?  ...
author: Rachelle P.

description:
Went here with my boyfriend because he had to do a project something with sex and food. All we thought about was this place. They sell cookies that is shaped like a penis. So, we got it. 

It was good. Very creative with the cookie. And the wall are amusing if you get to look at it when you stand in line. :)

I was pretty embarrassed we got a shaped penis cookie, but we'll come back again. :)
author: Gen M.

description: Got the recommendation from a couple of locals we met across the street. Grabbed a toffee chocolate cookie to go. It was still warm. I had to save it for the next day and wasn't sure how it would hold up. AWESOME! Still great flavor, still just the right amount of soft, and not any more greasy than it would have been if eaten fresh! That was a good sign! There were chunks of chocolate that were soft but not melted, so you can really enjoy biting into cookie and chocolate! I'm not a huge cookie person, but I ate the whole thing in one sitting!! You MUST try these delicious bits of sin!
author: Carol I.

description:
Nothing is better than indulging in a warm, melt in your mouth cookie after a morning of drunken madness. 

Hot Cookie makes a MEAN cookie and I definitely recommend everyone to stop by if you're in the area. 

Its a tiny lil spot, but who the heck cares?! I just want my damn cookie! nom nom nom
author: Christina D.

description:
I was referred here by a friend who let me try her cookie from hot cookie. its in the castro and it's a really small space. only room for a few people stand in front of the wonderful display a penis shaped cookies and generously sized cookies of all sorts. lots of choices but i only ordered chocolate chip and white macadamian nut cookie. i saw a toffee chocolate chip, definitely will need to order that next time! 
love this place! will be my new go to cookie place in SF.
author: Pauline H.

description:
What a cute kitschy place but can you bake the cookie next time? Is it really that hard?

I ordered a White Chocolate Macadamia Nut Cookie for $2.65 and the damn thing was so soggy in the middle and don't get me wrong-I love a soft cookie but this thing was GOOPY! 

I'm not pleased and I'm not finding the chocolate cocks amusing either. Be a little creative and make me a beaver cookie next.
author: Jessica K.

description:
This place is great! Being an avid cookie baker, I would consider these to be pretty good, I would definitely have to go back to try more varieties because I only tried the chocolate chip and the penis-shaped macaroon. That thing was huge! you definitely have to share it or something. 

I came here on a Sunday afternoon after having brunch around the corner with some friends, it was a nice desert-snack that hit my sweet tooth. The person working at the time was really nice and welcoming. I would definitely come back here if I'm in the area!
author: Nancy P.

description: They also have really great PG cookies here too. I brought a few for my friends and they all loved it.
author: Xteethx B.

description:
My friend just brought me back a penis cookie back from frisco and I have to say that not only was it huge, but it was absolutely delicious!! 

I can't wait to go to SF just to try the rest of these cookies!
author: Vicky M.

description:
Yes, the cookies are generally fine, but let's be real: The Penis is the true star here.

Actually a giant, chocolate-covered penis-shaped macaroon (heavy on the coconut) with a chocolatey front vein and coconut shavings for pubes, this guy has seen it all: giggles, facepalms, 4398523 playfully posed pictures (Ohmygosh, you guys! A COOKIE! Shaped like a PENIS! That goes in my MOUTH! Get it!?!) Purchasing of The Penis usually goes a little something like this:

You: (walking up to the counter)
Metro/Hip/Queer/Apathetic worker: "Hi, what can I get for you?"
You: "I'd like a penis."
M/H/Q/A worker: "Which one?"
You: "Uhh, it doesn't matter?"
M/H/Q/A worker: "Oh, it sure does! Every penis is unique, so you have to choose which one you want. We have this extra veiny one on the right, we have the one with extra hair, we have the one with hairless balls..."
You: "OKAY, I'll take that one!!" (making stabbing motions at the glass, giggling and flustered)
M/H/Q/A worker: "Okay, great!" (bored face) "That'll be $4.75."

For the record - I'm not a huge fan of coconut. I don't normally spend $5 on enormous cookies. I don't even really like penises in my mouth. But somehow, everything blends together perfectly to create the most divine casual dessert. Great for sharing with friends (if you're into that sort of thing), and out-of-town visitors will inevitably delight in the sheer shock value and Hot Cookie customers' undie pictures plastered all over the interior of the shop. A great stop on the way to Dolores Park for some afternoon relaxin'

(Shout-out to my feminist pals: I give special attention to the penis, yes, but only because I have never actually SEEN the boobs-and-vagina version. Hot Cookie is always miraculously out of this particular cookie when I stop by - so, please, no cries of "upholding the patriarchy!")
author: Sam S.

description:
Decent prices, great designs, cool variety... Hot Cookie is a happy place in the Castro, for sure.

Though they have great traditional cookies - in varied sizes, no less - what I really love is their milk chocolate toffee cookie. It's got that great, flavorful crunch, served soft on the inside, with a little hardness on the outside. I think it's something like 3 bucks, and worth it.

It's a tiny storefront, just trendy and small enough to get you in and out, but there's actually a few seats right around the corner, where you can watch the old F buses turn. Silver chairs for everyone, some homeless guys selling pencils or flowers and yelling at the bus drivers... all in a day.
author: Jiordan C.

description: I like stopping by Hot Cookie every once in a while- whenever I visit The Castro.  It's the novelty in their selection of cookies: boobs, penises, coconut flaked hair, etc, that brings me back for a laugh.  :0)  The employees there are also extremely nice and will offer suggestions if you aren't sure what to get.  I brought my friend here, who recently moved to The City for school.  We both ended up getting one of their giant cookies- IT'S SO SOFT and CHEWY....mmmm.  Next time, I'mma bring home a penis cookie for my family,  haha  Oh yea..I also enjoyed the pictures that cover the wall...It's just a fun little store to be in. Love it!  (I havent figured out how to post pics here..but I've got hot cookie ones ready once I learn.)  :0]
author: Selina C.

description:
The snicker doodle was a good cookie, not memorable,  but satisfying. The ginger snap was simply alright, I've had better.

The flair of this is shop is the real draw. The walls are lined w/ patrons that take pictures in the shop short-shorts attire. They have penis shaped cookies, too. The experience is worth taking a peek inside.

So if I'm in a cookie mood, this place will do. But it won't be their cookies that put me in the mood.
author: Allen F.

description:
Tiny tiny storefront, but the huge red neon "HOT cookie" sign caught my eye!  and who doesn't love cookies???  

The snickerdoodles are amazing! they have a gooey center, gooey!  I ate that thing faster than you can say cookie.  

Also tried pumpkin spice and ginger snap, they charge you by how much everything weighs, so not bad for $3 :)
author: Grace L.

description: I stop in there about 8 PM, on a Friday, and ask for 6 of a particular kind of cookie.  The guy behind the counter says, "I can't sell you that many because there wouldn't be enough left in the case for people to see when they come in."  WHAT ?  In the first place, there were at least a dozen of that kind of cookie in the case.  Secondly, aren't you in business to SELL cookies ?  I turned on my heel and walked out.  No, I'm not making this up.
author: Eddie W.

description: Definitely a fun place to take visiting friends! Always a good laugh introducing my friends to the penis cookie! I have yet to do the Hot Cookie challenge, but it's definitely on my bucket list. I've only tried the penis cookie, but it's GOOD. It kind of tastes like a girl scout samoa but better. And it's big! ...for a cookie at least. I can't eat it all in one sitting. I don't know why they don't make them in different color...not everyone likes 'em chocolate brown, how 'bout some white chocolate? :P
author: Kayla I.

description: Yummy macaroons and other large cookies. They have their novelty penis and female body chocolate covered macaroons. It's so large that you probably can't finish it at once. Their service is pretty good and they don't mind waiting on you as you make decisions. CASH ONLY!
author: Faye F.

description:
While waiting in a long line during a film festival at the Castro Theatre, or finishing off a fabulous night of bar-hopping, or taking a break from browsing bookstores or porn shops, who doesn't want to snack on a cookie, with the option of it being genitally shaped? 

This is a teeny tiny joint, but it has a nice selection of treats, and quirky photos and underwear and other things to gaze at on the walls and windows.

If only the cookies actually were served hot. If there isn't a long line, which is unusual, they might just agree to pop them in the microwave for you.
author: Leena K.

description: Cookies are great and the Rice Krispy treats are huge! Yum!
author: Josie C.

description:
Hot Cookie is always a destination while in the Castro!

I love all their cookies....yes even the penis shaped ones.

I love how small the place is and everyone who works there is always friendly and nice.

Love this place.
author: Tiffany S.

description:
cash only.

next time I'll get the penis shaped cookie.
author: Angela B.

description: Service is ok. They're cookies really are delicious. Their novelty naked Venus and penis cookies are freaking good. They're expensive since they're about $8 a pop but they're amazing. You can also try the normal macaron that's just a circle you don't have the get the penis or Venus naked novelty cookies, although those have more chocolate. They're cookies are soft and chewy for the most part. It can get got since it's super small and there's a fat line at times. Kinda pricey but good if you're craving a cookie and in the area. Parking a a bitch!
author: Jewlz L.

description: A friend got me a cookie from here.  Not just ANY cookie, but a big ass penis-shaped one!  Unfortunately it had coconut under the chocolate (it's basically a big chocolate covered macaroon), so I couldn't eat much of it.  I think they're a bit expensive, but then again, where else can you get such a cookie?  They'd make a great bachelorette gag gift.
author: Caroline K.

description: Love the character of this cookie shop right on Castro. The employees are very friendly, as is the owner, Josh, who let us have whatever we wanted on the house. Stop in for their colorful photo collection on the walls or the penis and Venus treats.
author: Steels M.

description: These cookies are the sweet, gooey kind! They can also come with balls!
author: Diane N.

description: I live in the Castro and I came here last night to purchase some cookies for a friend as a gift as I often buy cookies here for friends and for the hospital staff where I work, they have cute pink boxes to put them in with a sticker on it. I bought 4 cookies and told the girl at the counter it was a gift and could I have a box, she looked at me and said "no." I had to go to walgreens to buy a gift bag to put them in.  Hot Cookie has delicious cookies however, I will be going to Castro Coffee Company next time where they also have delicious treats and wonderful helpful people that work there. Hot cookie has lost my business for their inconsiderate service.
author: Maureen O.

description:
YUM-O!! This place is the bomb! I have been going here for years to get the best fresh baked cookies in the city. They have a huge selection and the dick cookie is awesome... and Im not just saying that to be cute. Its actually really good. And big. LOL
Get the macadamia white chocolate and the macaroons with a carton of milk and you will as happy as can be!
author: M K.

description:
I know, I know... you wouldn't believe I eat anything, let alone cookies... BUT Hot Cookie makes me crumble.

Cookies in the morning, cookies in the evening - you can have HOT COOKIE anytime!

Everything is D-LISH, so stop reading get get OVER THERE!
author: Matthew H.

description:
awesome cookies in a crazy gay loving neighborhood!!  pictures of porn literally slap all over the store like it's front page news.

onto the cookies... we got chocolate mint, toffee chocolate chip & regular chocolate chip.  

chocolate mint was AWESOME. i wish we got one more of those.... toffee was soft, moist and chewy even after 2 days!!!!  

as fancypants mentions, their chocolate chip is so-so.  why choose the boring traditional route when you've got many other exciting flavors to choose from?
author: Brittany H.

description:
Hot chocolate chip (and other cookies!). Om-Nom-Nom!

Plus you gotta love their 'dirty' baked goods. Castro classic.
author: Jeska D.

description:
My bf's high school friend, Russ M, and his fiancé came to visit us in the city. We were driving around, happening through the Castro, when we allowed my bf to go into a 'bakery' to buy a 'cookie' as we waited in the car.  A couple minutes later, white paper bag in hand, bf hops back in laughing like a giddy little school girl. The next thing Russ realizes, he's got a macaroon schlong being waved in his general direction. No big deal, as he's totally secure with his basically equal sized manhood (so he claims) and goes with it.  The rest of that day was a reckless adventure as Russ's fiancé, the macaroon, and I witnessed two grown 30-something men, regressing back to their high school years. The macaroon followed us around town, through biker bars and the water. I think at one point, it stroked my hair, a maneuver I wouldn't suggest.

Hottest $7.50 spent.
author: Jane K.

description:
$5 for a big black cock.  I ate it and was really full.  It was more of a chocolate covered donut rather than a cookie and needed a drink really bad.
     Great gag gift, but a bit too much to eat for one person, and you can't really just eat the tip and shaft and save the balls for later because it will get stale because it is donut-like.
     Hot cookie is a fun store, you pass by a lot of gay pron stores.  Next time I will buy a regular cookie, definitely need a drink to go with.
author: David K.

description:
It's a small area, so it can get crowded quickly, but everyone is so nice because of all the good smells. Or the pictures adorning the walls- Hot Cookie is nothing short of well loved. Plus, it's hard to be in a bad mood in Castro. I LOVE HOT COOKIE. 

There are few things in this world more delicious than their Butch Bars. Combined with Red Bull, they are nothing short of magical. 

Definitely a staple every time I'm in the area. The staff is super sweet. I'm proud to wear my Hot Cookie underwear. ;)
author: Elizabeth A.

description:
Eating Cayenne choco cookie and pecan cookie, and its AWESOME....  Thank you Hot Cookie for making my night. 
DELICIOUS
author: Christina L.

description:
'Tis a silly place... confections galore... we picked up a chocolate phallus and planned to melt it down later for dessert... turns out it was filled with coconut - debauchedly cute!

Not the best ingredients or craft in the world but you're there for the camp, not the biscuit quality - head elsewhere to get your dessert on...

Worth a stop if you don't mind blowing a few bucks on a chocolate reproductive organ...
author: Stephen P.

description:
More like Room Temperature Cookie! Maybe this is asking too much but to me, a place that calls itself Hot Cookie should give you hot cookies EVERY TIME. I have NEVER had a hot cookie here and it makes me sad :(
The cookies are good and fresh, but not nearly as hot as promised.
author: Melanie V.

description:
Seriously, how could one not love a place called hot cookie?

the cookies are pretty damn good but it'll cost ya.  We settled on Hot Cookie for desert last night.  5 bucks later I walked out with 2 cookies.  yup.2. 

it's always a treat.  i do like the brian bar and the I love when I'm lucky enough to catch some of 'yesterdays' cookies.
author: Traci E.

description:
It is worth visiting Hot Cookie even if you don't live very close. You will always find something fun and delicious to buy for yourself or for your friends as a gift. There are cookies of interesting shapes ranging from innocent like popsicles or not innocent like male body parts. One of my friends has also bought red Hot Cookie panties for his girlfriend.

When you go you should remember to ask for the cookies from the day before, because they are still good (as in chewy) but are a much lower price.
author: Hunni B.

description: Came here for the first time today. Heard about the penis and lady body cookies and had to come try it finally. Came with friends after eating some lunch over at Tacolicious on Valencia and I got the penis cookie for $6.75....I was a little shocked when I heard how much it cost but I decided to get it because I was already there. The store itself is really small...not what I had pictured in my mind. The walls were covered with pictures of people wearing the "Hot Cookie" underwear. Pretty nice decoration if you ask me. Haha. The penis cookie was extremely large....I shouldn't say cookie, its a giant chocolate covered macaroon, but cookie is easier to say. It was hard to eat since it was so thick and big...no puns intended. The macaroon was alright though, a nice dessert after some Mexican food. I wouldn't come back for the macaroons anytime soon. It was really weird eating the cookie, I was very very self conscious eating it on the streets of the Castro...I could already picture what people were thinking seeing me eating that penis...
author: Alex T.

description:
Where else can you find a small cookie shop plastered in photos of people in red tighty whities and cookies on a stick shaped like a "you know what?" 

You'll be sure to find a hot cookie or two here. And no i'm not talking about the hot cookie photos plastered on the wall, but rather their warm selection of cookies. Their cookies are okay, not the best, but can be the right dessert to if your craving a warm bite. I like their mini chocolate chip cookies and their peanut butter cookies and true to their name they are almost always served warm.

While they are open until 1 AM, it's an hour too early if you shut down the club and want a late night sweet bite after all the calories you burned on the dance floor.
author: Andrew S.

description:
Cookies themselves probably a 3, but a 5 for creativity! Hence, the 4 stars.

Best tasting cookies would have to be the mocha cayenne, toffee chocolate chunk, chocolate chip, and the mint chocolate chip! Pay by weight, so it's fair. Cookies are tasty but nothing SUPER special about them. They were good but had the potential to have been a LOT better if they were served warm! Especially on a cold night. Something to think about for the owners?

Best part about this place though is the penis-shaped cookie. I've never bought it, but if you're new to - or visiting - San Francisco.. it's definitely worth a glance. haha.. Something I have to tell everybody about!
author: Brad Y.

description: Outrageous and delicious, the best combination there is. I can't be anywhere near the Castro and not stop in here. The Snickerdoodle is MY JAM, nephew!
author: Mark C.

description:
I do feel like I can make these cookies at home... but if I'm in the area, why not stop by. I do prefer Anthony's cookies for their unique variations.

+ chewy 
+ chocolate chip or the oatmeal
+ open late 

- kinda pricey for cookies
author: Tammy T.

description:
Soon my HOT COOKIE picture will be on the wall.

Be sure to try the chocolate covered penis and balls shaped stick thing with shaved coconut hair on the base. It was a fluffy macaroon covered in rich milk chocolate. I posed with it in the picture...

So, on a birthday whim, I decided to get the HOT COOKIE undies too. The undies and a picture score you a free cookie. I went for the Pokie cookie, and it was still yummy the next day.

Still, it was quite possibly the wildest thing I did all weekend. Striping down to my undies in a cookie bakery in the Castro for a free cookie and a chance to have my picture on their wall. I love you, Hot Cookie.

XOXO
author: Chelsea P.

description:
Having grown up in Noe Valley, from which I took the 24 to the Haight everyday in high school, I find it a bit hard to believe that I managed to stay out of Hot Cookie until last weekend. I think I knew that once I tasted the cookies, I'd be unable to stay away for more than a few days at a time. 

The cookies are that good. I'd heard their snickerdoodle was unlike any other. That's true. It's amazing and so, so much better than the sugar cookies sprinkled with a bit of cinnamon that other shops sell. I don't normally like white chocolate, but that didn't stop me from enjoying the white chocolate macadamia. My favorite (so far) though, has got to be the toffee chocolate chip. Mmm...
author: Katie I.

description:
The best chocolate chip cookie....in the world! The cookie was perfectly soft and perfectly crispy on the edges. The cookie man even gave me a fresh cookie because the cookie in the display had been sitting out for too long.

I loved the photos of the men in the Hot Cookie red tighty whiteys posted on the walls. It was definitely entertaining to look at while waiting in line.
author: Cathy C.

description:
yesss! finally got a chance to try this place.

i had the oh so very popular penis. it had coconut inside and chocolate on the outside. not really a big fan of coconut but with the penis you can barely taste it because the its so chocolatey.
 
i would like to give a shout out to the person who helped me. you were very nice :] 

i was kinda hesitant to say the "penis cookie" i had to do it like this.
me:can i have that? *points*
behind the counter person: the penis cookie?
me:yes please *laughs*
bcp: whats so funny about that *smiles*

there should be NO bad reviews ever for this place thats all i know.
trying different stuff next time.

total: 5.75 soooooo totally worth it!
author: Anna P.

description: Amazingly delicious treats!!! I had the coconut white chocolate chip, chocolate chip, and toffee cookies. Admittedly a little pricey but soooo worth it!  A great excuse to visit the Castro district and walk around taking in the history and beautiful neighborhood!
author: Marina S.

description: A nice welcome to San Francisco type of place to take friends. The cookies are delicious also!
author: Nikita K.

description: Small place but very good warm cookies.  I love the chocolate toffee cookie.  Lots of cookie varieties.
author: AJ M.

description:
Mmm...so good! I tried the toffee milk chocolate cookie which had a perfectly chewy consistency, melty chocolate chips, and overall yumminess. Guy working there was very polite even though he was busy flirting. I would definitely come back here next time I was craving a cookie!

Oh and also they have penis and woman shaped cookies O_o
author: Julia F.

description:
Hot Cookie is hot shit.

As a self-described cookie monster (literally, there was a time where I was baking batches at a time and eating most of them myself), Hot Cookie where it's at. I've asked for their snickerdoodle recipe because it's extremely soft and chewy, with thick swirls of cinnamon giving it an intense look and bite. White chocolate cranberry oatmeal cookies (what a mouthful!) are my favorite to bake and consume. Hot Cookie serves them up just right. I forget whether or not they use macadamia nuts, but either way it's awesome.

Listen: it get a little pricey, but it's well worth it, especially for those two particular cookies. So get your hot ass on over there!
author: Valerie L.

description: Had a Blondie with toasted coconut, chocolate and other good stuff on top. It was amazing! I am coming from NY where similar cookie shops would be 5-8 for an individual cookie so idn how it stacks up against other places in the city but for $1.75 it was a pretty good price for me.
author: Max S.

description:
After seeing a friend of mine's pic of the penis cookie I had to come down and get one for myself. I took a detour over to the castro just to get it a few weeks back. 

I'm not a fan of coconut shavings but the cookie was made with em. I decided to buy it anyways because its a penis shaped cookie. I figured i can just eat the chocolate part and if I really hate the cookie part I can just throw it away. Well I ended up eating the entire cookie and loving every bite of it. I keep thinking about this penis cookie and keep wanting to go back but its so far out of my way. Next time I go to qbar I'm going to stop by and get myself the penis cookie.
author: Stephanie L.

description:
Snacking on a chocolate covered macaroon right now...
Soooo delicious.

My dad lost a bet to my mom and I so we tricked him into eating a "Penis Venus" cookie. He wasn't too happy but nonetheless, it's an awesome place to visit.

The place is a bit small and cramped but it smells wonderful and while you wait, you can take a look at the pictures of customers who participated in the Hot Cookie red underwear challenge.

As for the price, there were no signs so 3 macaroons coming out to be $5.60 seemed to be a bit much, but overall a very entertaining stop.
author: Stephanie C.

description:
If you're ever so fortunate to grab a toffee milk chocolate cookie coming right out of the oven, you'll know the euphoria I experienced the first time I went to Hot Cookie.  I've been coming back regularly ever since.

As a side note, I love the underwear and the photos all over the place of men wearing said underwear.  Oh, and the penis shaped cookies.  ;)
author: Tamara N.

description: Delicious cookies, extremely friendly staff, pictures of people in "Hot Cookie" red undies everywhere, what else do I need? I love this cookie shop not only because it's in one of the most lively and colorful areas in San Francisco, but because it delivers on sweet tooth cravings and provides variety. The assortment of cookies, as well as the helpfulness and mild humor of the staff makes a trip into this phenominally located shop a true pleasure.
author: Milan P.

description: A special place. Cookies, hot at all hours of the night.  Feels like everything just gets better when I go here. WONDERFUL DELICIOUS COOKIES!!!! OH GOD! Everything here is so yummy. My favorites are...well..anything with chocolate.
author: Jessica W.

description:
The snickerdoodle is a chewy cinnamon bun of a cookie and might be my favorite cheap treat in the city. Any friends I've dragged here always pick up something delicious and my boyfriend is particularly fond of the peanut butter chocolate chip cookie.

As for the phallic macaroons, I don't get the hype. You're in the Castro, kids. There are tasty penises everywhere.
author: Devon S.

description: Hot Cookie definitely has great cookies but I have never become attached. It is a rather small location and the selection is decent but nothing to die for. Everything is fresh and that is awesome but if you are not in the area I wouldn't roar over stopping here.
author: Diego A.

description:
Yummy yummy baked goodness.  I was fortunate enough to have a friend who gets a dozen cookies a month for the year.  My tastebuds say thank you, my waistline does not say thank you.

We came in pretty late to get a couple dozen cookies. The staff was super nice and can you really go wrong with a phallic macaroon?? I say no, if that's wrong, I don't want to be right!

Thus far my favorite cookie I've tried is the chocolat chip toffee one. Damn that's a tasty cookie, and they are pretty big too.  

I can't wait for next month to see what other cookies I can sample!
author: Lu E.

description: Small and cramped but you expect that in a city like SF. The brownies are to die for. Biting into one is like the beginning of an orgasm in your mouth LOL! I'm on a diet so I try to stay away from this place but once in a while I do in fact cheat hehehe.
author: Joe V.

description:
Stopped by here after seeing "Nine" at the Castro...with the delicious smells wafting out of there...it was mandatory, frankly!!!
All I can say is:  WOWWYGOLLYJEEZ!!!!!!!!  I felt like the kids must have when they  were first  unleashed inside Willie Wonka's Chocolate Factory!!! Row after row after ROW of yummy cookies, brownies, macaroon's, rice crispie treats and more!!!!!  Definitely a Mecca for anyone with a sweet tooth!!  So tasty! I will definitely be back! The crew that works at the shop were completely fun and energetic and helpful!!!   All one could do was point and nod!!  I shared my "haul" with friends I met up with later and the question heard over and over again was "OMG!! WHERE did you GET these??"  So Hot Cookie...I think you will have even MORE clients stopping by very soon!
author: Karen S.

description: we always come here before or after a singalong at the castro theatre :D either i feel that i need some sugar to give me enough energy to sing or i deserve a treat after singing at the top of my lungs. either way i need a cookie! the toffee milk chocolate and the cocoa cayenne are very very good. but with so many other flavors to choose from, it can be a dilemma to decide (like pumpkin and snickerdoodle) and because you pay by the pound rather than the unit, i never know if i have enough cash for multiple cookies lol. so bring more cash.
author: Sylvia K.

description:
Uniquely shaped cookies? I'm sold! Look, as people we're visual creatures. Anything that's interestingly shaped is bound to get our attention, especially if it's in any way vaguely phallic and/or sexual, because sex sells. Especially when the item in question is a chocolate coated pastry that's everything a macaroon wishes it could be once it's baked. 

Bottom line: Sex sells because sex is good. Or at least ought to be as good as one of the cookies here, otherwise you're probably doing it wrong (If you are doing it wrong, it's ok, a cookie will make you feel better!).
author: Liz P.

description:
I saw the sign from afar and was warned by my friends that i would be disappointed when i walked by, that cookie may not literally mean cookie. To my delight, they REALLY serve cookies here! 

Unfortunately, my cookie was pretty undercooked & my friend's cookie was overcooked. I could see the cookies being good, I think we just had a bad batch? Bummer because they were a bit pricey. The first time i came here, the line was too long. The second time, they were out of most of their "specialty" cookies.

I opted for the regular circle shaped cookies. However, if you are ever in need of a phallic shaped cookie, well, you know where to get your fill.
author: Stella C.

description:
Why have I not written a review for this?

Years ago, my brother and sis'-in-law took me here for what we have dubbed "crack" bars AKA Butch Bars, as they are so delicious you can't stop yourself from using them. Where else can you get a smattering of PB in between two crunchy fudge layers and still hold onto your sanity? Pokies make you want to pokey. Snickerdoodles a timeless classic, Toffee Milk Chocolate is stuff of my mom's dreams and the rice krispies need to all come home with me.

Not to mention the wonderful gear I like to strut around in my living room in...
author: Alita M.

description:
Solid four and a half stars! They'd have a full five if parking wasn't an issue and if they weren't cash only! :(

First time here, I didn't have cash so it was s little embarrassing, but I returned two days later to make up for it. Got the chocolate chip, white chocolate coconut, and the toffee milk chocolate, and damn.... They were probably the best cookies I have ever had! True story. And trust, my fellow yelpers, trust. I loooove baked goods so this is no joke! I even got an extra cookie for my boyfriend's dad and he raved about it as well!

Next time.... I'm carrying more cash with me, because theres a lot more cookies to try!!!!
author: amelia g.

description:
their cookies are pretty good, a slight crisp on the edges with a soft, chewy center, and there's a wide selection. they're a bit pricy, though i appreciate the larger size. 

i wish the prices were listed somewhere. i kind of balked when my total was $10 for 2 cookies--however, one of those two was the big macaroon-filled chocolate covered penis cookie. 

it's quite tasty, though a bit intimidating (as are all giant penises hovering around your face.)

for a place called Hot Cookie though, the cookies were rather room-temperatured. i would have loved my snickerdoodle to be piping hot. that's ok though, i got a giant penis and didn't even have to listen to mindless pillowtalk afterwards. winner.
author: Melissa N.

description:
Whenever you come here whether your sober or buzz make sure...........................................to ask for their  "FRESHLY BAKED COOKIES" because it will give you an orgasm! I  love this place! 

p.s. I still want to buy their HOT COOKIE underwear!
author: Angelica A.

description:
Uniqueness: 5+ stars -- where else can you buy a chocolate covered macaroon penis?

Price: 2 stars (overpriced) -- the cookies by the pound are really pricey! I remember thinking "never have I ever paid this much for a cookie"

Atmosphere: 4 stars -- the place is pretty cramped (I don't think more than 4 customers can fit in this store at once) but the place smells deeee-lish and the photos all over the wall with the "Hot Cookie" red underwear is pretty hilarious!

This is a really entertaining spot to bring visitors!
author: Magda M.

description:
Definitely a shop you should visit. It's fun, will satisfy your sweet tooth and a place where you can get a penis-shaped dessert. It is a really small shop but the people there are friendly and chill. 

Side note: Some friends and I decided to take this to Dolores Park to enjoy, lets just say, we got lots of comment from random passerby's. An occasional, "you like that?"
author: Amy L.

description:
Cousin: "dude, we should get some penis cookies in the Castro!!"
Me: "what the?!  really? (laugh) Is it good?"
Cousin:  "I don't know but I've always wanted to try it."

So, we end up, after a huge dinner @ Scoma's, in the Castro...staring through the glass at these ginormous (not to scale) chocolate covered macaroon cookies in the shape of a 'wang'... ... ... I point and ask the guy for "one of those" 

Guy: "Which one?"
Me: "That one right there"
Guy: "Which one is that?" (head turned as if to say I cant hear you!)
Me: "That BIG penis cookie!!!  THAT ONE!!"
Guy: (smiles) "You got it"

So, when you order one of these specialties, you have to say what it is before they give it to you (heh, no pun intended)  I'm not a fan of macaroon cookies but this one was definately a treat.  A bit pricey ($4-$5) but worth the reactions from your friends and....for me, coworkers.  

NOTE: DO NOT recommend bringing it to work :P  Also, they only come in black...er chocolate rather.  You don't have a choice of Vanilla or Lemon...one flavor only.
author: Kat C.

description: We got the snickerdoodle, macadamia coconut, and pecan chocolate chip. We had planned on eating them after dinner but the poor things didn't survive the walk back home. Super tasty. Wish the prices were a biiit better and as said, wish the cookies were served a bit warmer. But, dang... SO GOOD! Take credit cards plz!
author: Fede O.

description: Amazing cookies! My friends and I went there last night and bought a few of the big cookies. The white macadamia nut and snickerdoodle cookies were delicious! Worth the price!
author: Caroline P.

description:
got damn! 5 stars for having the biggest and best super sized chocolate covered penis shaped macaroon cookie! The penis cookie is very very VERY detailed! VEIN AND ALL! lmfao. Oh, and super nice chick behind the counter to help you. Very happy and friendly to serve you a "Penis & Venus" 

The chocolate toffee cookie is BOMB! Almost made me shit my pants (in a good way). Nothing better than pleasing your sweet tooth after a long night of drinking and dancing to tunes @ Qbar :D
author: Dre D.

description: I like Hot Cookie but think it's outrageously expensive. Why do 2 cookies cost over $5? They're good but they're not THAT good. I found the staff to be quite rude. Everyone says Hot Cookie is such an iconic place to visit in the Castro, but why? Is it because they make penis and boob shaped cookies? Yawn...
author: Tommy C.

description:
I don't remember how I got lured into this place...was it the fresh baked cookie aroma? the bumping house music? or pictures of half naked hot men posted all over the store?

Funny how I've never spotted this cutie little cookie joint in the heart of the neighborhood that I love to visit...and am happy to add on to my list of cookie joints

Love the enticing aroma as the bumping house music raced along with my heart seeing my most favorite desert in the world...cookies, my friends

Cookies were prepared fresh and the colors suggested that they were baked just right (not overcooked or burnt). The chunk was huge in size & no dryness of the crunch at all

I tried the delectable Toffee chip... one of the best toffee chip cookies I've ever tasted. It was crunchy, soft mixed & the best part was the toffee goo of the cookie... out of this world

Chocolate chip cookies were also satisfying especially with enough sweetness of the chocolate to keep you awake on a midday

And to all the girls, lady men ladies & bitches...you've gotta try the great penis (shaped macaroons)...lovin' the concept of cookies shaped in body parts that you can take a bite off of ....purrr

Big thanks to the cashier hottie who suggested that the cookies taste even better while wearing your hot pants...
author: Charmian D.

description:
Friendly staff and superb cookies!

Small place but the cookies are big and scrumptous. This is the place to get your penis and boob shaped cookies fix. We ordered the chocolate fudge cookie and toffee chocolate cookie. Both cookies came out to be less than $5 and the staff were very nice. The fudge and toffee were generous and every bite featured chunks of chocolate. It was chocolate sugar heaven. Now they need to make ice cream and sell ice cream cookie sandwiches. Man, would I be pleased!
author: Jennifer D.

description:
Open Late...

If you have a sweet tooth late at night, COME HERE!!

They have a great selection of sweet desserts and penis macaroon cookie shaped yummies :)

We always come here when we are bar hopping in the Castro.
author: Jay B.

description: Open late! 11pm or 1am depending on day of the week. The staff is awesome and they never rush you, despite it being a small crowded place. The cookies are trully the best I've ever had. Minimum $5 order for credit cards. You might get free cookies if they like you ;)
author: Sabina U.

description:
GET THE GIANT PENIS COOKIE.  If you like coconut- if you don't, then don't.  

Otherwise, it is absolutely delicious.  I assumed it would just be a mediocre cookie good for a few laughs, but it was fantastic- the macaroon filling was the perfect texture, and the chocolate wasn't too overwhelming.  I now crave it.  

Only problem- it's a pretty expensive cookie at over $5.  And that is literally the only thing keeping this from a 5 star review.
author: Karina P.

description:
Hot Cookie has been with me through thick and thin during my four amazing years in the Bay Area. I've bought penis cookies. (In fact, I bought one of these phallic delights the first time I visited the Castro. It was a rite of passage, seriously. Eh. Heh. Um.) I've bought Venus cookies. (I'm an equal opportunity guy, what can I say?) I've found myself in flagrante delicto with their cocoa/cayenne cookies. To top this off, the staff are cheerful and upbeat. This has to be my favourite bakery in SF, just for the quirkiness. And being me, I like quirky. So, yeah. Approved, 100%. 

...now that I'm writing this, I want a cocoa/cayenne cookie. Too bad I'm not in the Castro as much as I used to be.
author: Finn G.

description:
Stumbled upon this place while looking for a bar to hit up during NYE in the Castro. A friend's sudden hankerin' for cookies proved to be contagious so we all wanted to try it out.

The selection of cookies was pretty impressive, featuring varieties that I rarely see like coconut macadamia nut and pecan chip. After much consideration, I opted for the coconut macadamia nut cookie ($2.64). It was pretty delicious, highlighted by a sweet coconut taste and nice soft texture. I was a bit disappointed that these cookies were not warm, quite contradictory to this place's namesake. Considering that it was around 11pm and the texture of the cookie was chewy enough as is, it was still a very good cookie. My friend, swept up by the festive atmosphere of being in the Castro, decided to try out the famed penis cookie. Indeed, this monstrosity of a confection was shaped proportionately as a giant schlong, a coconut macaroon with a chocolate coating, with coconut pubes to top off the scrotal area. The actual cookie was pretty solid, but the novelty of suggestively putting that thing in your mouth in front of your friends made it more than worth it.

If you're in the Castro and need a quick and sweet snack, Hot Cookie should satiate that craving of yours.
author: Greg L.

description: I love the peanut butter cookies here! They're delicious.
author: Cami J.

description: I am in LOVE with their macaroon penis cookie! This is a treat that you can definitely share with someone. This cookie stays fresh compared to most cookies. It still tasted delicious after a day in the refrigerator. I definitely need to make a trip to Hot Cookie for more naughty desserts ;)
author: Shirley N.

description: Josh was helpful and fun!! And he even threw in a free cookie for my mom who was visiting!
author: Meagan R.

description: No complaints what so ever, sexy pics all over the walls , clean undies on the window, wonderful an fun area an amazing sweets !
author: Ashana D.

description:
Next time you find yourself sinking your teeth into a larger-than-life dark-chocolate-enrobed penis, you've got to stop and ask:

1. Does my man know? Will he be jealous?

2. I can take a bite *and* be welcome back for more, is it for real? So, I have to use my teeth? (It will melt in your mouth if you resort to simply sucking on it.)

3. It's huge; do you want to share it with me?

4. Do these come in milk chocolate? White chocolate?

5. Gosh, it's so heavy, does this count as a workout?

***

Aside from ginormous penis-macaroons, the cookies are fab.
Mini cookies... perfect for getting one of each and not feel like you're missing out on any variety and not totally going overboard.

The soft-core porn on the walls is a little tacky; I'd rather make my own instead of seeing you sport your Hot Cookie briefs. Considering the location of this wondrous little shop of goodies, I guess it adds to the charm and allure. It doesn't keep me away for sure.

Pricing is ambiguous since it's not really marked anywhere but charging by the pound is brilliant, or at least, a fair way of peddling your goods. Bonus points for staying up late and satisfying sugar cravings when nearby sweet shops are closed for the night.
I'll be back for more.
author: Alissa A.

description:
I love me some HOT COOKIE!  I've only been here a couple times and both times were more than satisfactory!

I took my bf here for the first time last night as we were in the area for a friend's party.  FRESH CHOCOLATE CHIP COOKIES - my favorite!  I picked up one and a M&M rice krispie treat.  My bf ordered an oatmeal raisin cookie and a brownie.  I spent about $9 for all the treats - not bad for the quality.

So good!  We didn't get to eating them for about 45 minutes, and even after then, the chocolate chip cookie was soft, warm and just melted in my mouth.  It was like there was a brownie inside of the cookie.  That good!  The rice krispie treat was HUGE and I saved some for breakfast this morning.  So good!  My bf's brownie was very decadent - the chocolate frosting on the top was so creamy and the brownie itself was so moist.  I'm not a big fan of the oatmeal raisin, but the little bite I had was delicious.  Could certainly taste the oatmeal!

When you go to the Castro, you can't miss the Hot Cookie sign!  There were a couple of other treats I wanted to try, but wasn't so brave to just yet...perhaps next time!

I HEART Hot Cookie!  Best chocolate chip cookies!!!
author: Christine E.

description: It's really amazing, because HOT COOKIE is next door to the glass Coffin it really covers up the geriatric, convalescent home smell of the glass coffin.
author: Lana P.

description:
Star 1: for the cookies with the m&ms in them

Star 2: for amazing peanut butter chocolate bars i've nicknamed "crack bars" because they are the best thing EVER

Star 3: for the deals where you buy some and get some free

Star4: for always being open after gay bingo when i've got winnings to spend.

Star 5: for the underwear i got that says "hot cookie" on the front and how well it went over when I flashed them at bay to breakers.
author: Nikki M.

description:
Stick with the cookies, they taste the best.  

The chocolate-dipped coconut macaroon cocks are not as yummy as they look.  Lots of calories I am sure, but they just don't taste good.

Prices for everything are too high because they have no competition.

They sell underwear that is red and says HOT COOKIE on the crotch.  So if you want to look at your boyfriend and think about cookies...then buy him a pair of these.  Seems kinda strange to me, but hey, whatever.

Small store, no seating.  If you are third in line then that means you are outside the door and standing on the sidewalk.  Ask for your order "For here" just to screw with them.  The milks they sell there are the tiny size.  Lame.

Anyways, if you are stranded in the Castro and need a cookie right now...then go for it.
author: Cynthia B.

description:
LOVE THIS PLACE!

Cookies are so delish, I can't even describe.  There's so much chocolate sweet goodness in those cookies, you'll be licking your fingers just like me when you're done.  They're open on the late tip, so you can get your sweet on before you head to the bar :)!   Last thing-- I heard that even the penis cookies are really good (yes, I know people that tried them).  Need I say more???
author: Angella S.

description: Penis cookies with whip cream is always great in the afternoon.
author: Sonlay V.

description:
"Tastes so good I want to dip my balls in it!"

Well sir, if your balls are macaroons please have at.  Then place said delicious macaroon balls, now covered in heavenly chocolate and if you know whats good for you coconut shavings, in my mouth.  

Thats right.  BALLS IN MY MOUTH, stat.

Nothing brightens my day like opening my fridge to the glorious sight of a penis macaroon.
author: Chelsea C.

description: Bought a large chocolate chop cookie, i swore it was gluten free/ vegan/ or whatever the health craze but it was delicious, and i bought a pair of Hot Cookie underwear that i haven't worn but i heard your supposed to pose in a pic with them on and bring them to the store, and you get  something? i forget, but I'm going back :)
author: Monica M.

description:
This is my favorite place to shock out of towners coming to visit. Not to mention a must for an bachelorette parties in your future. Yes, they have the crazy novelty item cookies. But more importantly their cookies are just really good! It's a must for a snack if you are seeing a show at the Castro theatre down the street. 

My favorite is the fudge peanut butter bar. It's soo decadent that it took me and two friends a couple of days to polish it off.
author: Marissa P.

description:
I try to avoid buying sweets from cute shops, lest  I become addicted to a place that serves particularly good sweets...but I needed to break a $10 bill to get on MUNI and decided to grab a cookie here - it was the best and worst decision ever.

The snickerdoodle cookies are amazing; so soft, chewy, cinnamon-y, sugary - but not overly so in any one respect - perfection in a confection. 

So, now I am obsessed and will have to try every cookie they bake. My latest try was the Peanut Butter and it was fab. I'll be back for more.

Oh yeah, and the staff are supremely sweet as well! Double win :)
author: Abby S.

description: What's not to love about this place.  The name delivers what it promises.  Butch bars and chocolate dipped rice crispy squares can't be beat at this cookie hole.  Tiny, cool little place where you can get all the sweet you need for a tidy price.  Dig it.
author: Sin F.

description:
Quick quick, it just came out of the oven. 
It's warm and toasty and covered with chocolate and the balls are sprinkled with coconut. It's heavy and waiting for you to eat it. 
*Bite* Oh it's filled with white stuff.
The cookie that is, sicko.
Hot cookie serves Penis Macaroons, which alone gives this place 5 stars. Really though, what a great photo.  Snickerdoodle was to die for. Warm center and crispy outside, yet overpriced for sure.
author: Kelly S.

description:
great cookies!! i recommend to get peanut butter ones.
they are sold by the weight, just be careful because two cookies can cost you $5.50 plus tips
author: B H.

description:
This place is located right in the heart of the Castro, it's located a few shops away from the famous Castro Theater. In San Francisco there are plenty of unique and really good places to eat it, this is one of the funniest and cool little shops. The parking nearby is limited and can be quite scarce depending on what time of day you go, or when during the week you go, but if you like penis shaped cookies or just cookies in general it will be worth your while. I didn't get a penis shaped cookie however, I got boobs, both the penis and venus cookies are coconut macaroons, it wasn't quite my cup of tea however. I guess they were good if you like a lot of chocolate or coconut. I also tried their M&M, Oatmeal Raisin (my personal favorite), Chocolate Chip, and Snickerdoodle and all were very good. The cookies are pretty good size and are not too badly priced, if you don't like cookies they also have rice crispy treats which looked pretty good and other sweets available. This is a definitely a cool little place to check out, so if you're in San Francisco or The Castro make a trip here. 

Pros: 
Really good cookies
Fun concept
Wide variety of cookies
Cool pictures on the wall

Cons: 
Only accepts cash
Street parking only
Hard to find parking
Small place, with no seating
author: Tony R.

description:
This was a cool unique out of the ordinary Mrs. Field's type shop.  You definitely find cookies here that you won't find at any other cookie shop.  I tried one of the pumpkin cookies since I've been on this winter-spice kick lately and it was alright.  I could taste the spice but I was expecting a lot more flavor than what I got.  What I LOVED though was the chocolate/marshmallow rice krispy treat!  It was sooo goood.  Then again, how can you go wrong with that combination?? I gave them an extra star just because the rice krispy there was so tasty.  

Oh, and cash only!
author: Melissa G.

description: I stumbled across this place while walking to Starbucks to get a "grande-nonfat-mocha-no whip-with two equals" for my beautiful wife.  I initially just walked by and didn't buy anything.  But there was no doubt I was admiring the cookies in the window.  So I eventually came back and bought 6 or 7 different varieties of their cookies.  WHOA!  Great selection of flavors.  Beautiful looking cookies.  Very big and clumpy.  Examples include snickerdoodle, macademia coconut, chocolate-chip peanut butter ... you get the picture.  Great tasting cookies.  A bit on the expensive side.  They sell by weight.  Average cookie will run you about $2.50.  If you want to scrimp a little, they have mini cookies too, but not in all the great flavors.  So if you ever are taking a stroll on Castro Street right near Market and you want a very nice cookie treat, this place is worthy.
author: Lewis C.

description:
So my boyfriend and I took two buses and walked at least a mile to get here. It was totally worth it. The employees are super friendly. A Giant Penis Cookie (chocolate-covered macaroon) and a "Sexy Bryan Bar" (similar to a 7-layer bar, I think) were $7.50 and OH-SO-DELICIOUS.

Unfortunately, I couldn't get my bf to let me buy him a pair of HOT COOKIE briefs. Ah well.

This is one of a bagillion San Francisco Birthday 2010 Trip reviews that I will be posting. Check 'em out.
author: Kate C.

description: Great cookies and sweets. Super reasonable pricing.
author: Marc M.

description:
This place is amazing.
They have lemon bars and this is the most incredible thing about this place.
mmmmlemonbars.

Oh, it's also cash only.
author: Lauren S.

description: Love love love Hot Cookie! Great service too! On vacation we bought hot cookies every night and enjoyed them so much, wish we had a hot cookie in our town!
author: Bren Y.

description: Cookies are good, environment is fun, not sure what else to say. I'd go back to get some hot cookies! The oatmeal cookies were super awesome.
author: Josh S.

description:
Who dosn't love cookies... and especially if they are in the shape of body parts? 

Also... they have little red briefs... kind of a two for one treat...
author: Jordan Y.

description: First of all, love the name. I was in the area and decided to check it out from a friend's suggestion. I have a huge sweet tooth but more of a cupcake/ice-cream person than a cookie person. Well, I had a cookie, forgot the name but it was chocolate chip with nuts, and I think I'm a cookie person now for sure! Sure it's a bit expensive for a cookie, but some of the ahem, cookie designs are interesting, and beyond that, they taste great too. It's a tiny shop so I guess they saved all the room for the cookies, which is just as well. This would be Cookie Monster's dream, for all you Sesame Street fans (you know who you are)!
author: a f.

description: A perennial must stop place in the Castro. Sometimes a line, sometimes not, but always worth going to for the best cookies. My partner is in love with the Snickerdoodle's, and I love the chocolate chip. The last time we went we got about 4 cookies and since they were all so warm from the oven, they kind of formed one huge singular cookie. Be sure to check out the pictures of  barely clothed guys modeling Hot Cookie underwear that are plastered over every spot on the walls.
author: John T.

description: I love cookies! Hot Cookie is an awesome little place to grab some cookies and go! They always have fresh cookies, and you can also buy day old cookies at a discount which are just as good! Not a lot of space in the shop, about three customers fit in there at once, but it is def the place I go to buy cookies.
author: Lindsey V.

description: Some like it HOT!  And I sure as heck do.  I only wish there was more toffee (please add some t-chips) in the Chocolate Chip Toffee cookie.  The cookie was warm and chewy... a lovely snack for the tummy.  There's also plenty of hilarious photo candy on the walls for the eyes.
author: Miss Bonnie B.

description: This is a solid 4 stars. I tried 6 different cookies here and all were very good. They are just the right amount of slightly crispy on the outside and chewy on the inside. I don't think I could pick a favorite as I really liked them all which is a bit rare. I also bought the penis macaroon, just because, and it was surprisingly delicious ;)
author: Trish L.

description:
You have to try the penis or Venus cookies (Venus cookie is shaped like a lady, penis cookie...you get the idea). Chocolate-covered macaroon cookies. So addictive. Every time I am in the area I drop by.

4 stars instead of 5 because it's cash only.
author: Ilovenap S.

description:
I guess I should've tried the penis cookie but I'm a prude and the white chip macadamia cookies were calling to me. I got one of those for myself (best cookie I've ever had) and tried a bite from all my friends' choices (rice crispie, snickerdoodle, and pecan). Everything was delicious but my cookie was my favorite.
I will definitely return the next time I visit SF.
author: Tara M.

description:
Oh my GOOOOOOOOOOOOSSSSSSSSSSHHHHHH!!


I am obessessessesssed with the cookies here. Their oatmeal raison cookies are to DIE for. Also their macaroons are so so so so good. Esp when they are warm and fresh out of the oven. This place is a landmark in sf. Hot Cookie is the perfect place for a quick and delicious sugar fix
author: Nina Q.

description: A great cookie and a Castro institution, but don't wait till the last minute or you might miss their signature creations.
author: Todd S.

description:
Whenever someone feels like making a trip to Hot Cookie, I am so down.

The cookies are humongous and can be shared. What you really want to get though is the penis maccaroon thingy. Coconutty goodness is balanced by the perfect ratio of chocolate. Sometimes, I have a carving so badly for these that I have to stop what I'm doing to get my frickin' dick!

3 stars only because the service sucks and I always seem to get the cranky guy who doesn't get any action.
author: Karina A.

description:
We stumbled into the Castro during pride on Saturday and found ourselves craving sweets. We needed real food, we needed water and we needed a cookie. We had been walking around and completing our pride photo journal scavenger hunt all day, and we were exhausted by the end of it. 

The store is small but is has so much character. The walls are covered with photos of everyone in their hot cookie underwear and the smells of fresh cookies wafts out of the door and into the street. They're a bit expensive and sold by weight, but we arrived when I tray of fresh cookies came out and they were 100% worth every penny.

I got the white chocolate oatmeal cranberry which was AMAZING. The flavors worked so well together, the cookie was so buttery and it was gooey and delicious in the center. I also had a taste of my friend's White Chocolate Macadamia cookie, and that was equally delicious as well.

And of course, we had to buy one of the penis macaroons to split because it was pride and we were at hot cookie and the novelty of it was amazing. On a hot day like Saturday, the chocolate started to melt a bit but the coconut was dense, the dark chocolate was very rich and creamy, and it was a damn good macaroon that allowed for some amazing pictures.
author: Stephanie H.

description:
Oh the good old days when Lime was open my friends and I would get tanked on bottomless mimosas and then go for dessert at HOT COOKIE. 

Oh the cookies are amazing there. Filled a bag and ate every single one- felt sick- but that was the best sugar high ever! 

My boyfriend has the HOT COOKIE underwear...highly suggest you purchase them
author: Alyssa A.

description:
besides ho awkwardly small it is. 
they have the best mini semi sweet chocolate chip cookies ever :3

i don't care for macaroon so I've never tasted the famous "Dick Cookie"
but they're funny.. and awesome.
i always buy them for my friends back home and they get a kick outta it :)
author: Chelsea B.

description: Omg so I have to tell you that this place is amazing. Natalie, Dylan, Jocelyn and Sebastian are all so really nice. They make me happy everytime I see them. I always order the Toffee Milk Chocalate cookie and everytime I come in they already have it in hand. They are truly amazing. Hot Cookie is one of the best cookie shops in San Francisco. I've had the regular milk chocolate cookie and the peanut butter one. I've had the Rice Krispy treat and the brownie and I can honestly say that everything I have had has always satisfied my sweet tooth craving. I will always be a loyal customer to those "hot cookies" and to Hot Cookie.
author: Garrett M.

description:
If you're in Castro, you kind of have to put a penis in your mouth. And, if you don't want to be written up for lewd and lascivious behavior, hot cookie will give you your fix. Big, dark chocolate members for your munching pleasure. 

Overall, the cookies and cakes are kind of just okay. So, other than the novelty, I wouldn't say this is a must see if you're a tourist (like me).
author: Manesh P.

description: Novelty of genital shaped cookies and naked men on the walls aside, this place bakes up some seriously delicious cookies. Next to San Francisco Baking Company, this snickerdoodle was one of the best I have had. And the white chocolate macadamia WAS the best I have ever had for that flavor. The cookies are soft and substantial. Good size and thick. Being a recent SF transplant, I of course had to indulge in the much talked about penis cookie. Folks, this cookie is damn tasty.  Whether you buy it for the shape or for the love of chocolate coconut goodness, it will delight you either way. Next time I have friends from out of town, I am taking them here. But I will certainly be back before that. I have become a cookie aficionado and this place knows a thing or two about baking...and penises.
author: Kim S.

description: I was not super impressed with this place.  The seven layer bar I bought was good and a decent price, and apparently this is a little slice of Castro local flavor, so I would recommend that someone visiting check it out, but after being there once I wouldn't go back.
author: Alexandra C.

description:
If you need a treat, get your butt over to hot cookie NOW. There is NO substitutes for cookies in San Francisco. After a long hard day of work or touristing, get over here and get a cookie!!! OR GET 20!!!! The smell is intoxicating. Remember to keep milk handy or bring extra cash to buy some there. I will part with two words..

WARM SNICKERDDOOOOOODLEESSSSSSSSSSSSSSS
author: Erik U.

description:
While driving in the Castro, the red chones in the window caught our eye. We drove around a few times but could not find parking. My guy asked an older gentleman on the street who was dressed in bicycle shorts if the place was worth it. His response was classic. He responded with a playful grin 'Well... do you like cookies?" 

This made me smurk and say "What the hell, let's give it a shot." Since we were virgins, we first decided on the basic chocolate chip. They were your basic chocolate chip cookie. They were good, but not exciting. Since our cherry had been popped, we decided on the chocolate macadamia and the cocoa cayenne cookies.  

My cocoa cayenne cookie was slightly crispy on the outside, yet soft and chewy on the inside. It was everything a cookie should be. The cayenne  hits your lips and tongue a moment after and is a nice surprise. I would not recommend this cookie to anyone who does not appreciate spicy foods because it might throw you off. The cayenne is intense, but only for a moment.  If you are looking for novelty items, you can pick up a  chocolate penis cookie that you can enjoy while checking out all of the pics of boys in their red chones that say "Hot Cookie". Aye yay yay!
author: Yvonne C.

description: My girlfriend was craving a cookie at 11pm at night and we found that hot cookie opened until 1am Saturday night so we drove there from north beach to grab a couple of cookies. Got the toffee milk chocolate, white chocolate macadamia and the peanut chocolate chip cookie. Definitely satisfied the craving!
author: Wendy H.

description:
yes. penis cookie is huge and only like 6 bucks and it takes many people or many days to eat it all cus its so rich

everything is VERY rich and sweet.
reasonable prices for pretty standardly good cookies. they are not out of this world, but you come here for the novelty of the place itself and where else can you get a pair of undies and a freshly baked penis cookie late into the evening? 
i dont reccomend the peanut butter chocolate bar because you get tired of its richness after 1 bite
author: Jess C.

description: Went for a awesome weener snack. It was very creative and BIG! Ain't gon lie bout that! But macaroons ain't my thang dogg, ain't my thang. Haven't tried anything else at the spot, but the penis was about 6 bux... Boo. Don't kno about that boyo. Mos def a great spot for a good laugh!
author: Lynn K.

description:
Im not sure why i was shocked to see photos of male customers in their 'hot cookie' underwear on the wall, and cookies shaped into P_ _ _ _'. haha, so yea, this place is nothing less of what you would expect from a cookie store located in the castro district!

The cookies are DELICIOUS!!! they are big with a little bit of a crunch on the outside, and soft and moist on the inside...... haha, but really, they are the PERFECT cookie!

The cookies are a little PRICEY, about $2.00+ a cookie, but they are definitely well worth it!!!

Every time ive been there the cashiers were quick n friendly!

In the end, this place was a recent find for me, but it instantly became my favorite cookie shop.... its just too bad that i live in Orange County, California!
author: Mario S.

description:
I bought a chocolate chip cookie last night and didn't get to it until the day after. The cookie was very good! I am actually eating it as i write this review.

1 hand holding and eating the cookie
1 hand typing this review

:-)
author: Eric A.

description:
I want to give my neighborhood cookiery more stars, but I think their cookies are pretty overpriced, and the recipes are only OK. I think their chocolate chip cookie recipe is fair, but their snickerdoodle recipe? Ech. Go get a snickerdoodle at Specialty's and compare the two, there really is no contest at all.

We have a Specialty's near the office downtown, and we make frequent post-lunch  trips for afternoon sugar highs. Specialty's cookies are more substantial, cost less, and are generally more yummy. Two cookies at Hot Cookie will cost about $5.00. At Specialty's.. about $3.50. 

I think I'd go up on the stars if they weren't charging mega-premium prices for OK cookies. I only go to Hot Cookie about once a year, and I wish they'd improve so I'd want to go more often.
author: Mike W.

description: Macaroon penis cookies to bring back to my buddies in SD! yup and they were shocked lol
author: Gleela Z.

description:
Hot Cookie's cookies are so good that I'd still get them even if they were rumored to give you leprosy.

If you're walking around anywhere near 17th/Castro, and have an overwhelming desire to fuck your diet all up, you have to stop in and grab some of their cookies.  They are sublime.

...Oh, they do have penis shaped cookies as I sure many other Yelpers may have mentioned...but they also have straight-up good ol' fashioned boob shaped cookies too, i.e. round.  However, the cookies are so good that even as a heterosexual dude I'd walk about town munching on Hot Cookie's cookies even if they were all penis shaped!

...hey...just thought of new word for them.... Cockies!
author: Chris D.

description: Hot Cookies have been on my must go to list to see what its all about. One afternoon, i had a sweet craving and decided to give hot cookie a try. My boyfriend was feeling iffy about coming with me after i showed him the penis shaped macaroon, but i ended up dragging him with me. haha. We both ended up sharing one and still was not able to finish it. It was just okay. I will probably come back to try their cookies and rice crispy.
author: Bianca C.

description:
Can't lie. Was intrigued by the penis shaped macaroon cookies on yelp and so my friend and I noted this particular bakery on our yelp-to-visit list.  After a day of perusing and shopping around the Noe Valley area, we were driving back up to pass the castro and head over to union, when my friend yelled "HOT COOKIE! I want!!!"  Yes. We are highly advanced in public speaking.

Well, I had already passed it, and was kind of in a hurry so we continued to drive past it but after a block of pensive thought we both looked at each other and knew.  I made an immediate u-turn, and next thing I know I was inside eating a SCRUMPTIOUS pecan chocolate chip cookie.  Boy was I underestimating their cookie by only getting one.  After the first bite, I knew I had to just try another one!  I got the snickerdoodle and it was also high delicious, although not as amazing as my pecan chocolate chip---must say though I am biased because I do love my pecans in baked items

My friend got a Chocolate Cayenne and the Toffee Chocolate chip.  The chocolate cayenne tasted just like a normal chocolate chip cookie--or so we thought---until the spice of the cayenne creeped up on us with a warm pleasant sensation.  We ended up playing a game called "guess when the cayenne will hit."  yes we are dorks.

All around AMAZING experience
author: Jane K.

description: Warm, fresh cookies at all hours of the day and night. Let's just say that butch, femme, top, bottom, gay, straight; they have a cookie for you. Whether you want a penis cookie, a coochie cookie, or a regular old gooey chocolate chip cookie. They have it all and it's tasty too!  A true SF experience and must visit.
author: Elizabeth K.

description: PENIS COOKIES?! Too bad the only vegan cookie they have is the Saint Ginger Snaps. They were good but a little pricey! I hope they make more vegan ones some time soon! Vegan penis cookies.
author: Justine L.

description:
These are some of the best cookies I ever had besides for homemade:). They make Mrs. Fields taste like a Chips Ahoy. Lucky if you get them right out of the oven. Get the Peanut butter chip or anything with nuts. My gf and I always end up here after a good meal. 
Cookies r the shizz!
author: Jeff M.

description:
Looking for a true taste of the Castro?!

This hole in the wall shop hits ALL the right spots. It's sweet titty treats and cock cookies will leave you longing for more. With a superior selection of goods, these hot cookies can conquer any craving. Great gift idea for bachelor / bachelorette parties or a sweet surprise. Plus they sell lots of  fetching cookie clothing for you to sport once you've become addicted. Cookies sell by weight - so expect to pay a bit more to enjoy this specialty store. To be able to laugh as you eat inappropriate sweets is worth it!

A deliciously raunchy way to enjoy a Castro Day!
author: Caroline J.

description:
Hot Cookie has delicious items.  They look like normal cookies but they are something special.  The first time I went, it was after going out.  I had peanut butter chocolate chip.  I thought it was really good, but I needed to check.  The next time, I went with a few people, so we tried many -- butch bar, cocoa cayenne, peanut butter chocolate chip, chocolate, maybe even something else.  The butch bar was RIDICULOUS.  hard to believe.  looked kind of eh but tasted freaking delicious.  I think you get it - YUM!

I have been back a few times.  The last time I went back, I had an M&M cookie.  Sad to say it bordered on stale.  Still tasty, but not Hot Cookie tasty.  But I still love you.
author: C K.

description: I used to only bake cookies from scratch at home because I couldn't find any that were better... Until Hot Cookie. Can't give this place enough love!
author: Amy S.

description:
My SF tour guide insisted that we take a peak inside and see the specially shaped cookies that are offered here...then, it dawned on me. There may not be another moment in my life where I could ask the following question in a serious manner to a woman at the counter of a store, "How much are the penises?"

I don't recall seeing any Venuses...there must have been a rush on them earlier in the morning.

Maybe next time I can add adjectives like, "big", "long", or "dark" to the sentence to keep things entertaining. Nevertheless, the cookies were kind of pricey. I insisted that we get ice-cream instead...but my buddy got one. I had a bite. It was tasty. A little too buttery for my tastes, but sometimes that's just what a cookie needs...
author: Dustin P.

description:
On the way to Blue, I saw this place. I didn't know it was actually a cookie place! :) But at dinner, our friend's bf said there's a really good cookie place nearby called Hot Cookie! Haha! So despite being full, we walked over and I got a chocolate covered macaroon & a chocolate chip cookie.  

I regret not tasting the cookies while we were nearby, because while we were waiting for MUNI and taking a bite, I wanted so badly to get more! The chocolate chip cookie had a nice balance of chocolate chips and cookie dough. It also had the nice crispy edges, but a soft, ooey gooey chewy center! YUM! The macaroon was huge! And not overly sweet. I wish they served mini chocolate covered macaroons, but that's mainly to save my waistline, not my wallet! haha.

Service was quick and simple.  For both cookies, it came out to $4.50.  The cookies were big and fed me, my bf with about 5 other people who got a lil bite of each. 

*CASH ONLY!*
author: Roxanne K.

description: Soft and chewy on the inside, crispy on the outside, heated when asked (if they're ever not warm), I heart you Hot Cookie, I heart you very much!
author: James G.

description: I'd go to Anthony's for cookies and cream, Bi-Rite for toffee chip, Humphry's for chocolate chip, and Hot Cookie if you like Mrs. Fields. Okay, maybe they were a little better than Mrs. Fields. Bought 5 cookies for $13.20. They charge by weight. The cookies were huge, but they weren't $13.20 good.
author: Sophia B.

description: Gotta love the Snickerdoodle!! One Hot Cookie!! Great after dinner place in the Castro, walk in Desert Bakery, fresh.
author: Troy S.

description: Pretty good snickerdoodles, but if you want a great one hit up Blue Bottle
author: Captain B.

description:
3.5 stars

What caught my eyes was the red boy's underwear on display and I still don't really get the connection.  It's quite interesting to see the wall of pics of different people in it.  

The penis and vagina cookies look interesting but I wasn't quite in the mood for chocolate covered macaroons.  It would be a great treat for a bridal shower of some sort.

Anyway, there were some interesting options and I wish I tried the spicy one (with cayenne pepper I think?).  The person who was behind the counter wasn't very friendly.  We bought a few of the mini ones to try - at $12/pound.  Got 1 of the chocolate fudge, 2 chocolate chips and 1 of the saint ginger snap.  

We tried the chocolate fudge first and were disappointed.  No chocolate flavor at all, boo!  Next was the chocolate chip, that was alright.  Wasn't expecting much with the ginger snap but that was the winner!
author: Gloria H.

description:
The first time i went there, it was supposedly a surprise 'visit' to this place. But...hell, knowing that I am always 'funky' in the brains, this place did not surprise me at all. We decided not to go in as 1) we were parked illegally (bus lane) and 2) there was a line out the door. 

Today, since we had the car parked in a safe place and all the time in the world to discover Castro, I insisted that we visit this place. Eye candy, lol. The choc covered macaroons in a shape of a male bodily part looked yummy. But i didnt get it as there were kids with us at that time. 

We just bought one cookie, the Pokie cookie with M&Ms on it. First bite was DELICIOUS! Second bite, HEAVENLY! The cookie was meant to be for my 3 yr old toddler. I had to keep reminding myself that I am sharing this cookie with her or I'd finish the whole entire cookie. 

I shall definitely come back here for more cookies or other flavors especially that choc covered macaroons!
author: Elly G.

description: These cookies were awesome. The coconut macaroons are spectacular.  Did not try the chocolate dick on stick just not my bag.
author: David C.

description: I mostly come here to flirt with the hot staff behind the counter ... and I always purchase whatever they recommend! They never disappoint.
author: Johnny W.

description: Eh, the cookies are alright. My friend wanted to come by here due to her late night sweet craving and she wanted to try Hot Cookie out. We looked at some pictures and thought it would be quite funny to buy provocative shaped cookies. But to our dismay, we went around 11 and all the obscene cookies were sold out! The worker said they're on hit! Obviously, lol! So we ordered what they had left. Ginger snap, white chocolate chip, oatmeal white chocolate raisin, and toffee. Out of all the cookies, my favorite was probably the ginger snap cookies. Not the best cookies, but not the worst. They price the cookies by the lb and take cash only.
author: Hannah L.

description:
Finally tried this place. :) didn't get anything crazy (like the chocolate covered .... shaped ones)  :x haha.. 

We got three:
Toffee-- My FAVORITE
Cranberry Oatmeal White Chocolate--LOVED this one TOO!! --I think i'm a sucker for white chocolate
Snickerdoodle- really good.. moist and soft and delish... 

Will definitely come back soon, me and my sugar fixation :)

oOOo and their wall is full of CRAZY @$$ pictures... hahah
author: Kristina L.

description:
HOT HOT HOT!!!  Okay, more like warm warm warm!  Never have I had such a delicious M&M cookie, the M&Ms were dime sized balls of melted chocolate bursting through their candy coating.  Plus the thick, soft cookie was crammed full of chocolate bits.  Can you say cookie heaven???

They weigh your cookie on a scale to determine the price.  Mine was $2.75... steep for one cookie, but once they heated it up and put it in my cold little hands I was in love.  $2.75 is not too steep a price for love.

Since Hot Cookie is glowing its beautiful neon lights on the sidewalk right where I wait for the bus, the temptation is too much to bear.  I'm sure I will be back.  Also, they have really cute red underwear that says Hot Cookie.  Too bad they look like they are only in men's sizes.  Maybe I will get one anyway and do some custom tailoring ;P
author: Laura W.

description:
There's a picture of me doing bad things on the wall... that alone is enough for 4 stars, but on top of that they have THE BEST cookies in the city.

It's also the only place I know of where you can get a d*ck on a stick.  It makes a great gift when visiting friends out of town or when guests come to SF.

I dared my friend to run up and down the street wearing nothing but his Hot Cookie underwear, and surprisingly he did it.
